TextBlock.Text: FOLLOWER OF GREED: Is the surveillance probe functioning well?
LEADER OF GREED: Yes. It is yielding magnificent results. Remind me to thank the Followers of Exploration for gifting us this device.
FOLLOWER OF GREED: Have you seen anything of interest lately?
LEADER OF GREED: I located the Followers of Logic. It seems that they have reverted their open-door policy and now require a code to gain an audience with their leader.
FOLLOWER OF GREED: But you have an idea of what the code may be?
LEADER OF GREED: Yes, I believe so. I overheard a Ghird speaking about shadow.
FOLLOWER OF GREED: Shadow? What could that mean?
LEADER OF GREED: I am unsure. However, the concept of using shadows for a secret code is certainly interesting.
LEADER OF GREED: This will make it much more difficult to negotiate, I think.
